message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which we believe would greatly benefit your business. Considering its value and the benefits it provides, I'm extending an initial offer of $1,150,000 for the product.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I see the value in your product, $1,150,000 is a bit higher than I'm currently comfortable with.  I'm willing to pay $1,050,000 for the product. This would still provide you a healthy profit while allowing me to stay within my budget.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to work within a certain budget. After careful consideration, I am willing to accept $1,080,000 for the product. I believe this price reflects both the value of the product and your budget constraints.
